name: HoloBert
description:
A HoloLens game that pays homage to Qbert.

 You are a medical pill trying to cure the level from bacteria.  Color every cubes of the level before the enemies germs catch you.

Point your gaze in the direction of where the player should go. He can move only one cube at a time, so you need to tap your fingers (in front of your eye gaze) on the cube next to the player position.
